name: Bloody Reindeers
description:
The game takes place during the Lapland War, when the Nazis were evicted from Finland. The fascist reindeers decided to kidnap Mrs. Claus as a last resort to get rid of the human race by blackmailing Santa Claus into spreading bombs around the world.

The main character/playable character of the game is Santa Claus. At the start of the game, Santa Claus arrives at an abandoned mansion, where the reindeer have brought a kidnapped Mrs. Claus
